TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit CanonicalTrackedOutputFiles extends System.Object

Docs.summary: This class is the file tracking log interpreter for .write. tracking logs in canonical form Canoncial .write. logs need to be rooted, since the outputs need to be associated with an input.
Default constructor.
